channel.title: 12 Common Photoshop Mistakes and Malpractice
channel.description:
Although not really a tutorial, I couldn't help post this. They forgot glow though.
http://www.thedesigncubicle.com/2009/01/12-common-photoshop-mistakes-misuses-and-abuses/

item.title: 12 Common Photoshop Mistakes and Malpractice
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:3, topic:256429”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=338698.msg2627563#msg2627563 date=1231894318]
It’s a shame he never read any such list on proofreading his articles before posting them.

Nevertheless, a good list, and as an artistically retarded person that has to do quick bodge jobs occaisionally, I’ve fallen foul of almost every rule there, go me.
[/quote]


Also, don’t worry, you’re not alone.[/quote]

It’s funny but I remember just today talking about a similar subject. I told you Bawlz, I told you!

Read full topic
